description.value:
The Lawkeeper serves as the god of comeuppance, balance, and mineral wealth. While not a blessing himself, he penned the treaty between the Blessings and Furies.

Edicts: Pursue perfection in your surroundings, earn wealth through hard work and trade, follow the rule of law.

Anathema: Break a contract, steal, undermine a law-abiding court.

Areas of Concern: Law, bureaucracy, cities, mining.
